lore: Like the Gorgons, the Smiths had to live in exile because of the genocide of their species, decreed by a human empress in distant lands.\n\nThe Brim Smith links his immortal soul to his weapon, transferring part of his power to his allies. If his weapon is destroyed, his soul is released from his body, resulting in the Smith's death.
menagerieDialog: I'm far more skilled in forging weapons than fighting creatures.
The final step to forging a mighty blade is to let it taste a bit of blood. Let's go!
Never leave home without ensuring that all your Artifacts are fully upgraded.
A creature without an artifact is like a human without pants. It just doesn't make any sense.
I grow tired of this incessant fighting. I'd rather spend my time doing what I love: forging weapons and armor.
name: Brim Smith
